sentences.sContent: It is said that Mrs White rules her husband strictly.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is said that Mrs White rules her husband strictly.
sentences.sCn: 据说怀特夫人对她的丈夫管得很严。

sentences.sContent: Mr Brown and Mrs Smith have been carrying on for some months now.
sentences.sContent_eng: Mr Brown and Mrs Smith have been carrying on for some months now.
sentences.sCn: 布朗先生和史密斯太太发生暧昧关系已经好几个月了。

sentences.sContent: He hitched his chair to me and told the secrets about Mrs Johnson.
sentences.sContent_eng: He hitched his chair to me and told the secrets about Mrs Johnson.
sentences.sCn: 他把椅子向我身边挪了挪，然后把约翰逊夫人的秘密告诉了我。
